category.name: FolderPermissions
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: FolderPermissions_ValidRolesForAccess
preference.preference_description: This preference specifies the valid Teamcenter User roles to be considered for setting access permissions for the folder on the Operating System containing Teamcenter managed data. If no values are mentioned, by default all roles would be considered for setting access permissions.
